curam.util.cache

Interface CacheEvictionApprover<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key
    V - the value

    public interface CacheEvictionApprover<K,V>
    An eviction approver adds another level of control over the eviction of items from the cache. No matter what eviction policy is in use, eviction of elements can be vetoed using an eviction approver.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean approveEviction(K key, CacheEntry<V> ce) 

    • Method Detail

      • approveEviction

        boolean approveEviction(K key,
                        CacheEntry<V> ce)
        Parameters:
        key - the key of the cache element ready to be evicted
        ce - the cache entry ready to be evicted
        Returns:
        true to approve eviction, false to disapprove
